title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - SIT Feedback Loop for Content explorer and DLP alerts (U.S. Government clouds)
description: ,Admins can provide feedback for sensitive information type (SIT) False Positives via Content explorer and DLP Alerts. This feedback can be provided in a compliant manner and users can see a summary view of the feedback in the SIT overview page. The feedback will be used to make systematic fixes to SITs for improved accuracy.
